name: A Jedi's Patience
Lore: 'Early on in his duel with Vader, Luke took his time in trying to sense his opponent''s weaknesses.',
Text: 'USED: If your character armed with a lightsaber is defending a battle, adds 2 to your total power in that battle.LOST: During a duel, cancel one of your duel destiny draws to cause a re-draw.',
